title: Which brand makes the best laptops? - Quora

response.answer_text: When it comes to a laptop brand, you don't just look at the design and specifications of laptop but plenty of opposite things like their technical support, value for money, durability and much more. 5 BEST LAPTOP BRANDS – 2020 1. APPLE  Apple is surely one of the luxury brands when it comes to laptops, computers, tablets, smartphones and music players. Unlike other brands, Apple have their own Mac OS that comes pre-installed on all their machines including iMac, MacBook, MacBook Pro and the latest MacBook. The reason behind Apple being number one is surely their efforts, innovations and quality. Also if we consider reliability and durability, Apple's MacBooks have no competition and most of their products last for a very long time. Best laptop in Apple brand: Apple iMac 21(https://amzn.to/2T88Eyk) 2. DELL  If you're looking for the best Windows laptop then you will certainly have to go with the Dell. Their technical and after sales support is really worth praising and is appreciated by users worldwide. There are number of reasons for why Dell is the best Windows laptop brand like their support, professional design, fair prices and durability. If you want to stick to one brand for all time then you can easily go with their three series' like Inspiron, XPS and Alienware. Best laptop in Dell brand: Dell Inspiron 13(https://amzn.to/3dDeTDS) 3. LENOVO  Lenovo is one of the most premium laptop brands and their prices are slightly higher compared to other manufacturers. However, their laptops are ideal for all kinds of tasks and can be used by anyone including professional gamers, businessmen and college students. They are mostly known for their business class laptops that offer not only power but also super flexible design. The Yoga and Flex series include some of the best portable laptops of 2020. The Chinese brand has recently started manufacturing smartphones and they are known for their long lasting batteries. Best laptop in Lenovo brand: Lenovo ThinkPad L13 Yoga(https://amzn.to/3o6HEhd) 4. HP  HP also known as Hewlett-Packard is one of the oldest electronics brands that is not as popular as it used to be. When it comes to desktops, they still provide the most reliable machines and are widely used by gamers and professionals. As a laptop brand, HP is way better than Acer and ASUS when it comes to durability as well as performance. However, the battery life is a huge issue in most of the HP laptops and that's why many users avoid going with HP. Best laptop in HP brand: HP pavilion x360(https://amzn.to/2Tai7VO) 5. ASUS  ASUS laptops are mostly known for being affordable compared to other brands and reason behind that might be their in-house manufacturing of motherboards. Their mini laptops and Chromebooks are highly known for being the best budget-friendly machines. Currently they have a big lineup of computers from budget notebooks to high-end gaming beasts. They have also improved their technical support recently and you can get help from them over phone, Twitter or Facebook. Best laptop in ASUS brand: ASUS VivoBook Flip 14(https://amzn.to/35dXnlF)
